title: Annoying Caslemedia popup when using Thunderbird
content:
Can anyone help me delete the popup of Caslemedia when using Thunderbird. It started a couple days ago. My yahoo mail account seems to be blocked. The popup seems to use a lot of computer resources. I have tried three different anti virus software detection/removal without any luck.

Thanks, Steve
creator: aerowraps

title: My address book not showing addresses.
content:
I need to delete my students' addresses for data protection reasons.

The addresses don't appear in the Thunderbird address book. They do appear in the 'To' line of an email panel.

How do I get access to the email addresses in my Thunderbird for deleting?

With thanks for any pointers, Ulrike

title: How do I make Outlook the default app
content:
After installation Thunderbird became the default app. How do I reset the default app for email back to outlook?

I've already set the standard app for email to outlook, but when I share a document from for instance Excel a new Thunderbird mail is created

title: compact folders
content: Compact Folders (Alt-f f) no longer appears to compact ALL folders of an account. Previous versions (prior to 115) did ... Regards, Mike
creator: michael94

title: TAA Compliance
content:
Hello, I am seeking to get the latest version of Mozilla Thunderbird approved on my employer's enterprise. There is currently a big push to support American products so my job requires confirmation of Country of Origin, ie an official document or letter, from the software company to provide proof that any software requested is sourced from either the United States or friendly partners (https://gsa.federalschedules.com/resources/taa-designated-countries/)

If someone from Mozilla could provide an official letter to me confirming that Mozilla products are primarily developed and/or transformed in the US or its partners that would greatly appreciated as no new software will be approved without this.

Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions or concerns. Any document you provide can be emailed to sean.m.lee8.civ@mail.mil.
creator: light_foot16

title: Thunderbird e mail front page
content: On my e mail inbox, front page, it has displayed recent e mails on the top half and the lower half shows a preview of the content but I have clearly hit a button which has removed the preview and just shows the whole page of e mails in the inbox. How do I revert to the preview please?
creator: stuart.meyers

title: message preview lines (like in Outlook)
content:
Hi,

I just installed Supernova and it looks nice and clean. So I hope to switch over from Outlook to Supernova but I can't find how I enable e-mail message previews.

I mean, in Outlook I have my inbox and from every e-mail I can see the first line(s). I assume that in a modern program as Supernova this is also possible? But I don't know how.

Can someone please explain me how to do that? Thnx.
creator: dhont.philippe1

title: Thunderbird application fully opening (change in behaviour)
content:
Note: Thunderbird is assigned the mailto action in Firefox.

Previous experience:

1) Firefox -> Email Link 2) New message window would appear - only the new message window

New experience:

1) Firefox -> Email Link 2) Thunderbird application opens 3) New message window appears

Reason: Opening the full application runs actions (e.g. filters).

How do I return to the previous, more efficient, functionality?
creator: alan1world

title: Tearing my hair out!!!!
content:
New version this morning. Thunderbird is now double spaced - the most annoying problem at the moment - how can I reduce this to single spacing in the message pane, the folders pane and why is the test so huge in the message itself. It would be useful for TB to show a key to all the names of the parts of the screen.

Firstly, can you please help me to reduce the double spacing. I did try to install the previous version but I don't want to mess things up and I've no idea what a .css file is, so simple instructions please.

Also, I have a specific size of box for when I write a new message but I'm typing away and my words are not seen unless I widen the box!!

Can we have the old version back please - if it ain't broke............

Ann
creator: Bonnie2

title: Calender Crashes after Caldev Import
content:
Hello, our Company uses Horde as a Email and Calender service. We export our Calenders with Caldev and connect it to our Thunderbird application. Sadly since the Thunderbird Update 115.0.1, when loading the calender, Thunderbird Crashes and even with waiting for up to 6 or 7 minutes Thunderbird wont load. We use win10 Enterprise on Version 22H2. What we found was that the Problem only occurs with Staff that has read and wright rights. ThankÂ´s in advance for the help

Best regards Philipp
creator: philipp.bausch

title: Calendar for Thunderbird v115
content:
I can't add calendar of Office 365 to Thunderbird v115 because TBSync (https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-us/thunderbird/addon/tbsync/?src=hp-dl-mostpopular) add-on don't support new version. I think this is core feature and Dev Team can add this feature to Thunderbird.

Thanks so much

content:

My question is whether others are seeing the same or similar.

title: Wrong return email address received by recipient
content:
G'day,

Please someone who is not a piece of granite, as I am, help me solve this problem.

I 'was forced' by circumstances to obtain another email address for my wife, so that I could enter her into competitions, pay her charges, respond to her mail etc.

I entered her new email address into my 'new' Thunderbird email program (my old ISP dumped my account because it could not support me with it's new machines.)

Now whenever I send mail from my own account 'ozgunman@gmail.com' it is received from 'ggungirl33@gmail.com' and a reply is sent to that address as well, - this fault is creating havoc with my life.

Thank You Russ
creator: ozgunman

title: Thunderbird flatpak 115.1 crashes when selecting print
content:
Elementary OS (info in image), Thunderbird 115.1 (info in image), Firefox 116.0.1 (info in image)

Both Firefox and Thunderbird crash when selecting print (info in image).

Current workaround: Open gmail in Chrome and print from Chrome.

All software is the latest versions available within flathub and Elementary AppCentre.
creator: canopus_star
